body.name: Travel Bottles Set for Toiletries, TSA Approved 3 oz Travel Size Containers, Leak Proof Refillable Squeezable Travel Essentials, BPA Free Silicone, for Shampoo Lotion Body Wash Liquids, 18 Pcs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 10 hrs 43 mins
features: ✈ TSA APPROVED & TRAVEL ESSENTIAL SET: 18 pcs travel toiletries containers set meets TSA requirements, you can carry it on the plane freely. Including: 4 x travel size bottles (3oz/89ml), 4 x cream jars(0.33oz/10ml), 1 x spray bottle(1oz/30ml), 1 x lotion bottle(1oz/30ml), 1 x spring dropper, 1 x funnel, 1 x label, 1 x brush, 4 x spoons, 1 x transparent bag, different accessories for your different needs. This set is an essential accessory for anyone who wants to travel easily and comfortably.

🍀 SAFE & DURABLE AND EASY TO CLEAN: These travel containers are made of high-quality silicone, which are safe, non-toxic, BPA-free, durable, soft, easy to squeeze. The accompanying spoon, funnel, and cleaning brush make it easy to refill and clean the bottle. They are perfect for camping, business trip, gym, travel, home use and more.

🌟 EXCELLENT TRIPLE LEAK PROOF DESIGN: Travel bottles adopt 3-layer leak-proof design, equipped with a sturdy flip-top lid and a “十” drip-free valve, ensuring that your bottles will withstand the rigors of travel without leakage or overflow, keep your cosmetics and luggage safe and integrated. You will have a pleasant and smooth journey.

🐬 WIDE APPLICATION & EASY TO DISTINGUISH: These travel size containers set is suitable for most liquids, such as shampoo, conditioner, body wash, facial cleanser, lotion, sunscreen, liquid soap, shaving cream, face cream, and more. (NOTE: Silicone bottles are not recommended to hold oily liquids, such as makeup remover oil.)The attached label sticker can be affixed on the bottles cap to distinguish, easy to use. With this containers set, keep your travel organized!

🎁 GREAT CHOICE & BEST GIFT: Our travel toiletries containers set is perfect for travel or fitness enthusiasts. Whether you're heading on a weekend getaway, business trip, or long vacation, this travel bottle set can meet all your needs, keeping you prepared. This portable travel bottles set for Toiletries is the best Birthday, Festival, Christmas Gift for family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good travel companions
reviews.reviewText: Their size is just right for carry-on luggage, making airport security checks a breeze. The quality of the bottles is good; they are sturdy yet flexible enough to squeeze out contents easily.I appreciate that they don't leak, even when subjected to the pressure changes of air travel. The variety of colors in the set is a nice touch, helping to easily identify different toiletries. Overall, these travel size containers are practical, reliable, and good for any frequent traveler looking to streamline their packing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wow so great quality for a price! It is an essential for everyone who travels. I liked how every bottle is for airplane carry on standards. I loved the colors and overall style. Easy to use! Great design and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Handy and cute travel bottles set; jars less good
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the SpassLeben Travel Bottles Set for Toiletries in the "D" set of colors.Firstly, I chose set "D" because the design really appealed to me. I particularly liked the silicone tubes with the leaf design, which added a unique and pleasant touch to the overall aesthetic.The silicone tubes were definitely the best part of this set for me. They not only looked nice but were also exceptionally functional – no leaks, no spills.However, the small clear jars didn't quite meet the same standard. I used two jars on a recent trip, and they both leaked - one just a little, but one quite a bit. I'm considering skipping these in the future. Thankfully, the silicone tubes alone made the set worthwhile for me.Overall, I found this set to be a helpful and visually pleasing addition to my travel essentials. Despite some leakage issues with the small clear jars, the silicone tubes alone make this set a cute and practical set for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Leak Proof Travel Bottles
reviews.reviewText: You get a travel bag that contains4 silicone leakproof bottles that hold 3 and 1/4 ounces4 small screw top containers for cream, makeup etc. that hold 1/2 ounce each2 spray bottles that hold 1 and 1/4 ounces. The spray is a very fine mistOne funnelOne pipet/suction type dropperOne cleaning brush for the silicone bottlesan assortment of 4 spoons/scoopsTwo sets of labelsUnlike some travel bottles, the silicone bottles do not leak. I filled them up to the top, so they hold more then the stated quantity. I squeezed the pretty hard as if they were being squished in your carry on bad and they didn't leak. That's great.All in all this is a great assortment of travel containers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as a gift and it was a hit. Set includes bottles, containers and a funnel for transferring gels, creams and lotions in to travel containers. Labels re also provided to identify contents. Perfect for the traveler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall nice travel set to have. In cargo hold 3 oz bottle was fine but jar leaked a bit.
reviews.reviewText: I used this kit for a vacation where I had it in my checked luggage on the airplane. Overall I really liked it. The 3 oz bottle I used was great. It was easy to fill, did not leak, and was easy to use once I reached my destination. The larger funnel is now the best small funnel I have in the house with multiple uses. The labels were quite convenient to use. As a bonus, the left over items will be great for crafting use.The small jars are great for putting small items in, like an Apple air tag. Unfortunately they do not have a rubber seal, which I would not expect for this low price. I used 3 of them to hold gel products in my checked luggage, and at least one of them leaked, though not so much that it significantly lowered the amount of product I had. Thankfully I had placed them in a ziplock bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like the variety of containers this comes with, the silicone bottles feel really high quality and are super easy to use. I use the spray bottles daily as I like to mix my own DIY lens cleaning solution and use that on my glasses and other surfaces and so far no leaks whatsoever, would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is the right size and convenient to use for travel.
reviews.reviewText: The material is good. Easy to use.
